name: @alex-way/adapter-lambda
description: An adapter for [SvelteKit](https://kit.svelte.dev/) for AWS Lambda.  [Serverless](https://serverless.com/) deployment.
author: Alex Way

scripts.build: rimraf files && esbuild src\serverless.js --bundle --format=esm --platform=node --external:'index.*' --external:MANIFEST --external:SERVER --outfile=files\serverless.js && copy src\shims.js files\
